item.title: making twitter useful again
item.description: I’ve unfollowed everyone I follow on Twitter, and am slowly starting back up from scratch. I’m only going to follow people who are: Underrepresented people in Tech (as broadly construed) Journalists And that’s it. I’ll follow back friends I’m not otherwise in contact with as well, but might take a while. I’ve had this for a few days and am already enjoying using it far more than I did before.
